title: Businessman gets life in prison over Haitian president's assassination
description: A businessman has been sentenced to life in prison for helping Colombian mercenaries get weapons to assassinate Haitian President Jovenel Moise in 2021.

title: All aboard the new generation of night trains
description: As climate solutions go, this has to be the most restful. Go to sleep in one European capital, wake up in another with a virtuous glow alongside your fresh croissant.

title: At least 233 people killed and hundreds injured after train crash in India
description: At least 233 people have been killed after at least two trains were involved in a crash in eastern India.

title: At least 50 feared dead and hundreds injured after train crash in India
description: At least 50 people are feared dead and hundreds of others have been injured after a train crash in eastern India.

title: Navalny has sarcastic prison requests for pet kangaroo, moonshine and balalaika denied
description: Alexei Navalny has had his sarcastic demands to Russian prison administrators of a pet kangaroo, a balalaika, and a bottle of moonshine liquor denied.

title: E-fit image released of mystery man who died on flight to UK
description: An e-fit image has been released by police of a man who died on board an aircraft to the UK, as they try to identify the victim.

title: Epstein tried to contact disgraced US gymnastics team doctor Larry Nassar while in prison
description: Billionaire paedophile Jeffrey Epstein tried to contact a disgraced US gymnastics team doctor while in prison, newly-released documents show.

title: Champions League final referee to stay after apologising for attending event linked to far-right
description: A referee who attended an event in Poland linked to a far-right movement will remain in charge of the Champions League final later this month.

title: Are sleeper trains a genuine alternative to flying?
description: Once in a state of seemingly terminal decline after the explosion of budget flights, Europe's night trains are having a moment.

title: Putin may have made the same mistake as Hitler - and it will be exploited in the months to come
description: Russia may have stepped up the frequency and intensity of missile and drone attacks on Ukraine's capital, but Kyiv's air defences appear to be holding firm.

title: Wizz Air and Ryanair passenger numbers soar as airlines recover from pandemic impact
description: Wizz Air and Ryanair have reported further rises in passenger numbers as they continue to recover from the impact of the global pandemic.

title: China drilling hole over 11,000m deep into the desert
description: China is drilling a hole in the desert more than 11,000m deep in order to study areas deep beneath the planet's surface.

title: Thousands march in Jerusalem Pride parade 'in struggle for LGBTQ rights and democracy'
description: Thousands joined a pride parade in Jerusalem for the first time under the country's new right-wing government, to celebrate love in all forms and to fight for human rights.

title: Suspect linked to multiple murders called police and said 'you're looking for me'
description: A suspect in the murder of an 80-year-old man called police in Texas and confessed to killing two people, officers said.
